comments.body: Can we just get this from the `queryExecution` in the cache manager?  or at least define it explicitly here.  I don't want dataframes and datasets to fall out of sync with regards to what the canonical plan phase is.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -27,6 +28,7 @@ private[sql] trait Queryable {
   def schema: StructType
   def queryExecution: QueryExecution
   def sqlContext: SQLContext
+  private[sql] def logicalPlan: LogicalPlan
